content: robust & reversible hat by sarah hood yarn 2 contrasting colors of malabrigo rasta mc can be a varigate or solid but cc should be a solid needles us size 13 16 circular us size 15 16 circular and us size 15 dpns gauge 7 sts and 13 row per 4 in stockinette st on larger needles sizes adult extra large this hat is knit with the stockinette side facing out though the reverse side is the more interesting in pattern you may occasionally want to look at the wrong side to make sure you have been slipping your stitches with the yarn in the front so that the slipped cc lines are not interrupted with cc loosely co 40 44 sts join in round rounds 1-7 k1 p1 to end of round round 8 in mc k3 s1 wyif to end of round round 9 in mc k3 s1 wyif to end of round round 10 in cc k3 p1 to end of round repeat rounds 8-10 until piece measures 8 9 inches from cast on edge for extra slouch add another inch crown round 1 in mc k3 s1 wyif to end of round round 2 in mc k1 k2tog s1 wyif to end of round round 3 in cc k2 p1 to end of round round 4 in mc k2 s1 wyif to end of round round 5 in mc k2tog s1 wyif to end of round round 6 in cc k1 p1 to end of round round 7 in mc k1 s1 wyif to end of round round 8 in cc p2tog to end of round cut both yarns leaving a long tail use cc to thread through remaining stitches and pull taut weave in ends and block photo post to ravelry
